list.name: End of Event Frames
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL $days DAY)) + UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.EndTimestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AS time_sec,
	'' AS text,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', EventFrameTemplate.Name, ',', EventFrame.Name, ',', 'End') AS tags
FROM EventFrame
	INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrame.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId
WHERE EventFrame.EventFrameId IN ($eventFrames)

list.name: Lookups
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL $days DAY)) + UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AS time_sec,
	'' AS text,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', EventFrame.Name, ',', EventFrameAttributeTemplate.Name, ',', LookupValue.Name) AS tags
FROM EventFrameAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrameAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrame ON Element.ElementId = EventFrame.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrameAttributeTemplate ON EventFrameAttribute.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId = EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON EventFrameAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN Lookup ON Tag.LookupId = Lookup.LookupId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId
	INNER JOIN LookupValue ON Lookup.LookupId = LookupValue.LookupId AND
		TagValue.Value = LookupValue.Value
WHERE (EventFrame.EventFrameId IN ($eventFrames)) AND
	(EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId IN ($eventFrameAttributeTemplates)) AND
	Lookup.LookupId IN ($lookups) AND
	IF (EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL, (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp), (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AND
	(TagValue.Timestamp <= EventFrame.EndTimestamp))

list.name: Notes
list.rawQuery:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL $days DAY)) + UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AS time_sec, GROUP_CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(Note.Timestamp, '%m/%d/%y %H:%i'), ' - ', Note.Note ORDER BY Note.Timestamp SEPARATOR '
') AS text, CONCAT(Element.Name, ',', EventFrame.Name, ',', EventFrameAttributeTemplate.Name) AS tags FROM Note INNER JOIN TagValueNote ON Note.NoteId = TagValueNote.NoteId INNER JOIN TagValue ON TagValueNote.TagValueId = TagValue.TagValueId INNER JOIN Tag ON TagValue.TagId = Tag.TagId INNER JOIN EventFrameAttribute ON Tag.TagId = EventFrameAttribute.TagId INNER JOIN EventFrameAttributeTemplate ON EventFrameAttribute.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId = EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrameAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId INNER JOIN EventFrame ON Element.ElementId = EventFrame.ElementId WHERE EventFrameAttribute.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId IN ($eventFrameAttributeTemplates) AND EventFrame.EventFrameId IN ($eventFrames) AND IF (EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL, (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp), (TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AND (TagValue.Timestamp <= EventFrame.EndTimestamp)) GROUP BY TagValue.TagValueId

targets.rawSql:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL $days DAY)) + UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) AS time_sec,
	TagValue.Value AS value,
	CONCAT(Element.Name, '_', EventFrame.Name, '_', EventFrameAttributeTemplate.Name) AS metric 
FROM EventFrameAttribute
	INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrameAttribute.ElementId = Element.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrame ON Element.ElementId = EventFrame.ElementId
	INNER JOIN EventFrameAttributeTemplate ON EventFrameAttribute.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId = EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId
	INNER JOIN Tag ON EventFrameAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId
	INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId
WHERE EventFrame.EventFrameId IN ($eventFrames) AND 
	EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId IN ($eventFrameAttributeTemplates) AND
  (
    EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL AND
    TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp OR
    EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NOT NULL AND
    TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp AND
    TagValue.Timestamp <= EventFrame.EndTimestamp
  )

SELECT EventFrame.Name AS 'Event Frame',
  Element.Name,
  Note.Timestamp,
  Note.Note
FROM Note
  INNER JOIN EventFrameNote ON Note.NoteId = EventFrameNote.NoteId
  INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameNote.EventFrameId = EventFrame.EventFrameId
  INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrame.ElementId = Element.ElementId
WHERE EventFrameNote.EventFrameId IN ($eventFrames)
ORDER BY Note.Timestamp

list.label: Enterprise:
list.name: enterprise
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Enterprise.EnterpriseId AS __value, 	Enterprise.Name AS __text FROM Enterprise 	INNER JOIN Site ON Enterprise.EnterpriseId = Site.EnterpriseId     INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Site.SiteId = ElementTemplate.SiteId     INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId     INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId     INNER JOIN EventFrameAttributeTemplate ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId

list.label: Site:
list.name: site
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Site.SiteId AS __value,  	Site.Name AS __text  FROM Site     INNER JOIN ElementTemplate ON Site.SiteId = ElementTemplate.SiteId      INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId      INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId      INNER JOIN EventFrameAttributeTemplate ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId WHERE Site.EnterpriseId = $enterprise

list.label: Element Template:
list.name: elementTemplate
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId AS __value,  	ElementTemplate.Name AS __text FROM ElementTemplate     INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON ElementTemplate.ElementTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId      INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId      INNER JOIN EventFrameAttributeTemplate ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId WHERE ElementTemplate.SiteId = $site

list.label: Event Frame Template:
list.name: eventFrameTemplate
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId AS __value,      EventFrameTemplate.Name AS __text  FROM EventFrameTemplate     INNER JOIN EventFrame ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId      INNER JOIN EventFrameAttributeTemplate ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId WHERE EventFrameTemplate.ElementTemplateId = $elementTemplate

list.label: Event Frames:
list.name: eventFrames
list.query: SELECT EventFrame.EventFrameId AS __value,     EventFrame.Name AS __text FROM EventFrame  WHERE EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = $eventFrameTemplate AND     (         EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL AND         UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) >= $startTimestamp OR         EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NOT NULL AND         UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp) >= $startTimestamp AND         UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.EndTimestamp) <= $endTimestamp     ) ORDER BY StartTimestamp DESC

list.label: Attributes:
list.name: eventFrameAttributeTemplates
list.query: SELECT EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId AS __value,      EventFrameAttributeTemplate.Name AS __text  FROM EventFrameAttributeTemplate WHERE EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = $eventFrameTemplate

list.label: Lookups:
list.name: lookups
list.query: SELECT Lookup.LookupId AS __value, Lookup.Name AS __text FROM Lookup WHERE Lookup.EnterpriseId = $enterprise

list.name: days
list.query: SELECT CEILING(IF(EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL,     (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(TagValue.Timestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp)) / 86400,     (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.EndTimestamp) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(EventFrame.StartTimestamp)) / 86400)) AS Days FROM EventFrame     INNER JOIN Element ON EventFrame.ElementId = Element.ElementId     INNER JOIN EventFrameTemplate ON EventFrame.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId     INNER JOIN EventFrameAttributeTemplate ON EventFrameTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId = EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameTemplateId     INNER JOIN EventFrameAttribute ON Element.ElementId = EventFrameAttribute.ElementId AND         EventFrameAttributeTemplate.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId = EventFrameAttribute.EventFrameAttributeTemplateId     INNER JOIN Tag ON EventFrameAttribute.TagId = Tag.TagId     INNER JOIN TagValue ON Tag.TagId = TagValue.TagId WHERE EventFrame.EventFrameId IN ($eventFrames) AND     (         EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NULL AND         TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp OR         EventFrame.EndTimestamp IS NOT NULL AND         TagValue.Timestamp >= EventFrame.StartTimestamp AND         TagValue.Timestamp <= EventFrame.EndTimestamp     ) ORDER BY Days DESC LIMIT 1
